data

Class Song

  • java.lang.Object
    • data.Song
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    PostSong

    public class Song
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a song with all its relative info. By default, it is created using a JSON file.
    Author:
    Yohan Chalier
